channel.title: Authors on Adam La Caze
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Adam La Caze

item.description: I am a clinical pharmacist with a PhD in the philosophy of science. I teach professional practice, therapeutics, clinical epidemiology, critical appraisal and ethics. My research focusses on philosophy of science, philosophy of medicine and ethics. I am particularly interested in exploring philosophical approaches to challenges that arise in interpreting and applying biomedical research. I am a member of a group of researchers in the School of Pharmacy working on better understanding medication adherence.
